sentences.sContent: Executives say they are leery of the proposed system.
sentences.sCn: 行政人员们说他们对拟建的系统持怀疑态度。

sentences.sContent: They were leery about investing in a company controlled by a single individual.
sentences.sCn: 他们不太放心把资金投向一间由一人独自操控的公司。

synos.tran: 机敏的；狡猾的；猜疑的；送秋波的

remMethod.val: leer(斜眼看， 睨视) + y → 斜眼看 → 怀疑的

trans.tranOther: If you are leery of something, you are cautious and suspicious about it and try to avoid it
